data.message:
Ok here's my question !
How the fck do you get over moving around to 7 different schools as a kid in a city like Toronto?? At 33 shit is still the underlying fucking hate I have in me cause of the shit that was done to me... My fck shrink has no answers.. Family days get over it your 33!! But did it not make me who I am!! A fuckin angry girl... Who trusts fucking nobody.. Only one who seems to relate is YOU! But your to fkn famous and out if reach!! Wtf do I do to drop this feeling already ???????
U must have thousands of us asking same shit.. But your music / lyrics are what makes me want you to not help me but tell me what u do know to let it go ???????
Love your mind!
